description:
Haruno gets word of a manga that will be adapted into an anime. As she lives in the real-life location of that manga`s story, she scouts out locations and decides to make it a focus for her manga creations. Haruno tries to carry out her plan to visit these manga pilgrimage sites on an ambitious schedule, but the other members of the Cinephoto Club can`t seem to hide their unease. And so begins the hellish schedule of this location scouting tour....
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Anime-ka Chokuzen!! Jigoku no Dangan Seichijunrei Stamp Rally!!
Right Before It Becomes an Anime!! The Manga Pilgrimage Stamp Rally with a Schedule from Hell!
アニメ化直前!! 地獄の弾丸聖地巡礼スタンプラリー!!
